system.description: 1/Resound, when you are the target of an attack, you can cancel that attack against you and blow them wide open. If they're adjacent to you, push them 1 tile.
system.flavor: Preach the Blade Gospel: be as a sword, indiscriminate and betraying. To become a sword you must first betray yourself. The perfection of this technique is a recalling of its past version in the Bladesong: becoming the Sword is to realize one's self, the perfection of mindfulness within one's place in nature.
